issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] README has invalid github URL
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6705](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6705). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
README has:

git clone <https://github/apache/arrow>

but should be:

git clone https://github.com/apache/arrow

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6705?focusedCommentId=16938529) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5499
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5499>
